text:
Hello everyone! My name is Devin Yoshimoto. I'm based in Tokyo, Japan, but originally from the U.S. :jp: :us:

For the past 5 years, i've been working as a writer and editor. Our company covers a niche sector of the green technology industry. I'm hoping to refine my writing skills towards a broader content marketing career.

I've already learned so much in such a short time browsing through the channels, so thank you. I'm looking forward to connecting with you all and contributing what I can. :pray:

If anyone would like to talk about green tech, or learn specifically about the sustainable heating and cooling sector :wink:, feel free to DM me. I've got a bit of expertise in the area so would be happy to share! Linkedin <https://www.linkedin.com/in/devin-yoshimoto-21442165/|here>.

text:
Hello everyone, I am Abdulmajeed Abubakar, from Nigeria. 

I have been the team lead of content creators at Murtaaz Scents  for the past 3 years and have also worked for other platforms as a volunteer. 

My interest in perfumery pushed me to actually work more from the perfumery niche and this is why I still work with Murtaaz Scents but if there could be any other niche that could catch my interest, it's either education or finance.

I am happy being a member of this wonderful community and sure it's gonna be a new way to success. 

Regards.
